Data Stories

Data Stories

Overview:
Data analysis is crucial for drawing meaningful conclusions and driving innovation. In this game, teams will interpret data to tell a compelling story and propose a solution to a real-world challenge. The theme for each year is announced approximately 4 weeks before Data Driven, but the exact figures and resources are kept secret until the start of the compeition!
